description: This file handles server-side rendering requests in a Remix application, including logic for handling bot requests and browser requests, setting appropriate headers, and streaming responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry point for handling incoming HTTP requests, sets CORS headers, handles OPTIONS method, and delegates to bot or browser request handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles requests identified as from bots, streaming server-rendered HTML with error handling and timeout.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles requests from browsers, streaming server-rendered HTML with error handling and timeout.
